attributes.action: Remove the short sighted ban on short selling and recognise it as a legitimate market activity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Short selling has not been the cause of the financial crisis. Poor decision making by the management teams at financial institutions and the lax attitude towards consumption and credit by the general population and government is to blame.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
